item.title: CVE-2024-31342|2024-04-10T16:14:55.911Z -- WPcloudgallery -- WordPress Gallery Exporter
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WPcloudgallery WordPress Gallery Exporter.This issue affects WordPress Gallery Exporter: from n/a through 1.3.
